description:
Yow! Kellan is one hot surfer dude!
Originally raised in the south, he moved to the beach to take part in all things ocean. He loves surfing and boogie boarding, and I bet he has everyone's heads turning on the beach.
Kellan has only done fitness modeling, but when his fitness model girlfriend started doing adult video, he decided he would give it a roll too. He did find the pay was not that great, though I think the pay divide between the two types (straight/gay) is narrowing as more women tune into the net to watch porn. So he quickly found offers for doing guy-guy work, and for now, the two of them haven't had any jealousy issues.
He has a super hot body, long thick cock, and his ass is amazing.
Kellan seems to be down to try and make the gay-for-pay thing work, so is going to start slowly by getting his dick sucked.
title: Kellan Chestnut - Solo
